DOGECOIN: NODE: ./dogecoin-1.14.6/bin/dogecoind -datadir=/MOUNTS/CHROMOSOMES-I/DOGE/MAINNET # https://github.com/dogecoin/dogecoin/blob/master/doc/init.md https://github.com/dogecoin/dogecoin/blob/master/doc/getting-started.md Binary: /usr/bin/dogecoind Configuration file: /etc/dogecoin/dogecoin.conf Data directory: /var/lib/dogecoind PID file: /var/run/dogecoind/dogecoind.pid (OpenRC and Upstart) or /var/lib/dogecoind/dogecoind.pid (systemd) Lock file: /var/lock/subsys/dogecoind (CentOS) WALLET: ./dogecoin-1.14.6/bin/dogecoin-cli ./dogecoin-1.14.6/bin/dogecoin-qt
